statements: DELETE FROM customer_ltv WHERE total_orders < 5 AND total_purchase_amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE total_amount > 1000 AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE age < 30 OR customer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM purchase_history WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 AND purchase_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM retention_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Email' AND activity_date < '2022-02-15';
DELETE FROM purchases WHERE customer_id = 100 AND purchase_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM campaign_results WHERE campaign_id = 50 AND conversion_rate <= 0.5;
